content.raw:
> These models are quite big to host them in a git repository

Note that this repository will be converted to a git repository sometime before June. 

> some of the textures are above 90Mb.

I'm not sure about individual files, but Fuel is already hosting models that are over 600MB in total size, like [this one](https://app.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/fuel/models/NIOSH%20Mine%20Virtual%20Tunnel%20SR). Note that Fuel also uses a git repository underneath though.
